name: Quadron
overview: It wasn't meant to be this way; the Defender-Droid elite team singularly designed to guard the invaluable Q-Crystals house in the Quadron base had dwindled to an army of just one. But this was the sole survivor for a reason; decades spent repelling the marauding,crystal-stealing aliens had hardened and transformed the droid into the ultimate fighting machine. By gaining power-ups from rapid alien kills, to wielding high-tech objects scattered throughout the base, this innovative droid had learnt to overcome the impossible and keep the alien menace at bay! Use skill and strategy to control the last remaining D-Droid; guard the Quadron base from relentless alien attack, and gain the best score and highest wave possible! Quadron is an original arcade style game for the 48K ZX Spectrum created in the mould of the 1980s Williams classics. Set in the Quadron complex, you are charged with the task of defending the crystals mined by the relentless onset of marauding aliens. Featuring fast arcade style gameplay, multiple weapons, enemies, collectables, powerups, and a pointer based status screen and scanner, the game calls for both fast reactions and a surprising dose of strategy!
